title: How to Find the Right Roommate
description: Learn what to look for in a roommate, including lifestyle compatibility, communication skills, and shared responsibilities.

title: Living on a Budget
description: Tips on how to split expenses, budget groceries, and reduce utility costs while living with roommates.

title: Roommate Agreement Tips
description: Create a clear roommate agreement to avoid conflicts over chores, bills, and guest policies.

title: Healthy Roommate Relationship
description: Explore ways to maintain respect, communication, and balance in your roommate relationship.
